updateGuide.alertLabel: A new version of <1>{{eserviceName}}</1> e-service is available. Before updating, read the guide below
updateGuide.title: Upgrade guide
updateGuide.description: It is possible to update the fruition request to the latest version of <1>{{eserviceName}}</1> e-service. Here are some useful informations

faq.summary: What does it mean to upgrade a fruition request?
What happens to my active purposes if I upgrade a fruition request?
What should I check before updating a fruition request?
How can I test the changes before updating the fruition request?

rejectionMessage.title: Fruition request rejection reason
rejectionMessage.description: The provider states their reason for refusing to activate this fruition request. You can always submit a new one

certified.title: Certified attributes
certified.subtitle: Questi attributi sono certificati da una fonte autoritativa riconosciuta, e non necessitano di ulteriori certificazioni.
certified.emptyLabel: There are no required certified attributes for this e-service

verified.title: Verified attributes
verified.subtitle: Questi attributi necessitano di verifica da parte di almeno un erogatore. Potresti già possederne alcuni (o tutti).
verified.emptyLabel: There are no required verified attributes for this e-service

declared.title: Declared attributes
declared.subtitle: Devi dichiarare sotto la tua responsabilità di possedere questi attributi. Potresti già possederne alcuni (o tutti).
declared.emptyLabel: There are no required declared attributes for this e-service

certified.description: These attributes are certified by a recognized authoritative source, and do not require further certification.

verified.description: These attributes require verification by at least one provider. You may already own some (or all) of them.

declared.description: You must declare under your own responsibility that you possess these attributes.

consumerNotes.title: Message for provider
consumerNotes.description: If there are any groups of attributes marked with “or”, indicate in this message which of those you want to be recognized, based on the documentation you have uploaded. Enter any other useful notes

documents.title: Documentation
documents.description: Enter all the documents necessary for the recognition of your attributes

bottomPageActionCard.title: Quick publish
bottomPageActionCard.description: Have you entered all the information for this agreement request? From here you can immediately publish a draft, or delete it. If you want to post later, just save the draft above or leave this page

provider.title: Fruition requests
provider.description: In this section, you can manage all the fruition requests you have received from parties that want to subscribe to your e-services

subscriber.title: Your requests
subscriber.description: In this section, you can manage all the fruition requests you have sent to e-service Providers
